org.archive.wayback.replay.charset

Class BaseEncodingSniffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.wayback.replay.charset.BaseEncodingSniffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncodingSniffer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteOrderMarkSniffer, ContentTypeHeaderSniffer, PrescanMetadataSniffer, UniversalChardetSniffer

    public abstract class BaseEncodingSniffer
extends Object
implements EncodingSniffer
    Implements common utility methods for EncodingSniffer.

      • isCharsetSupported

        protected boolean isCharsetSupported(String charsetName)
        test if charsetName is supported by Java.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - character encoding name
        Returns:
        true if supported.

      • contentTypeToCharset

        protected String contentTypeToCharset(String contentType)
        return character encoding from content-type, if specified and valid.

        some encoding names are replaced. see mapCharset(String)

        Parameters:
        contentType - content-type text, ex. "text/html; charset=shift_jis"
        Returns:
        character encoding, ex. "shift_jis", or null character encoding is unspecified, or invalid.

      • mapCharset

        protected String mapCharset(String orig)
